meanings.sent1: Her outfit had a lot of pizzazzes, making her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of pizzazzes, with colorful decorations and lively music.
meanings.sent3: The movie lacked pizzazzes, so it was quite boring to watch.
meanings.sent4: His speech was filled with pizzazzes, captivating the audience from start to finish.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display added pizzazzes to the night sky, creating a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To add flair or excitement to something
meanings.sent1: She pizzazzes up her salads with colorful toppings to make them more appealing.
meanings.sent2: The designer pizzazzes the runway show with stunning outfits and creative themes.
meanings.sent3: He pizzazzes his presentations with funny anecdotes to keep the audience engaged.
meanings.sent4: The chef pizzazzes the dish with a sprinkle of fresh herbs for an extra burst of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The musician pizzazzes up the performance with energetic dance moves and catchy tunes.
